name: Sherrif Flint
description:
After finding my old gameboy a few weeks ago, and playing some of my old games, i wanted to create a game similar to those old games.

In this platformer you have to go on an adventure with sherrif clint.

Jump, shoot, bounce your way to the end of 5 levels, and collect stars along the way.

AD to move, W to jump,  and Left Mouse Click to shoot.
